message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.
Alice, $1800000 is way above my budget. I'm very interested in the product, but I can only go up to $800000.  This is my absolute maximum,  let me know if you're willing to consider it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $800000 is your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to sell the product at that price. However, I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is the minimum price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great deal considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm still at my maximum of $800000. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to go with another option.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your maximum budget of $800000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell it to you for $1000000. This is as low as I can go, and I believe it's still a great deal considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to meet me at this price.
